2TheOriginalIdentityWalletPasswordWillBe: 2. The original identity wallet password will be used as the password for all wallets and used for verification such as transfer/backup mnemonic phrases.
beSureToKeepTheAddressPasswordInASafePla: Be sure to keep the address password in a safe place.
clickOnTheWordsToArrangeThemInMnemonicOr: Click on the words to arrange them in mnemonic order.

confirmToTurnOffFingerprintPayment: Confirm to turn off Fingerprint payment?

doNotDiscloseOrShareTheMnemonicPhraseWit: Do not disclose or share the mnemonic phrase with others.
enterTheMnemonicSeparatedBySpaces: Enter the mnemonic, separated by spaces
fingerprintVerificationCannotBeStartedPl: Fingerprint verification cannot be started, please use password verification
ifTheAddressPasswordIsLostItCannotBeRetr: If the address password is lost, it cannot be retrieved.
ifYouLoseYourMnemonicPhraseYourAssetsAre: If you lose your mnemonic phrase, your assets are lost forever.
importTheAccountWithTheMnemonic: Import the account with the mnemonic
inTheNextStepYouCanSeeTheMnemonicWordsUs: In the next step you can see the mnemonic (12 words) used to restore the wallet. In order to ensure the security of the wallet, please be sure to complete the backup of the mnemonic phrase as soon as possible.
onceThePasswordIsLostItCannotBeRetrieved: Once the password is lost, it cannot be retrieved!
passwordIsNotLessThanDigits: Password is not less than 8 digits
passwordsCanNotBeTheSame: Passwords can not be the same
pleaseEnterTheMnemonicPhraseOrPrivateKey: Please enter the mnemonic phrase or private key of any wallet

supportForMultipleBlockchainspossessUnli: Support for multiple <br /> blockchainsPossess unlimited <br /> possibilities
supportsTheImportOfBip39MnemonicPhrasesA: Supports the import of BIP39 mnemonic phrases and passwords of Bioforest Chain
theIdentityIsNotBackedUpYouCanOnlyExitAf: The identity is not backed up, you can only exit after the backup is completed.
theMaximumLengthOfThePasswordIs: The maximum length of the password is
theMnemonicsAreSeparatedBySpacesAnd_12_1: The mnemonics are separated by spaces, and 12/15/18/21/24/36-bit mnemonics in Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and English are supported. Just enter the passwords of Bioforest Chain directly

thePasswordWillBeUsedToVerifyWalletTrans: The Password will be used to verify wallet transfers, view mnemonic phrases and other important functions (this is alocal password)
theSystemFingerprintHasBeenBanned: The system fingerprint has been banned, please reset the system fingerprint first.
thisIsYourMnemonicGetTheMnemonicToOwnThe: This is your mnemonic.Get the mnemonic to own the wallet asset! Please write it down on paper and keep it in a safe place.
thisPasswordIsOnlyUsedForTheSecurityProt: This password is only used for the security protection of the wallet. BFM Pay will not save your password, nor will it be able to help you retrieve it. Please remember and keep your password!
transactionPasswordLoseTips: Note: Once the transaction password is successfully set, it cannot be retrieved if it is lost!
whenTurnesOnYouCanUseYourFingerprintInst: When turned on, the fingerprint lock will be enabled
youNeedToVerifyTheTransactionPasswordOfB: You need to verify the transaction password of before you can initiate a transaction
